entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
